titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 68: Hebrew-Judeo-Arabic glossary of 1st Kings 5:3-7:29

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: The fragment contains uncommon words from I Kings V 3 בריאים- VII 29 מורד and in the opposite column, their respective one-word definitions in Arabic; two words remain with no definition; Some words appear in the list twice, matching their biblical appearances.
Condition: loss in lower external corner; stained, faded.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).

keywords.term: Judeo-Arabic language , Glosaries, vocabularies, etc Early works to 1800
